imdb.plot outline: The story revolves around Pooja, a young girl from a small town who has big dreams and doesn't want to be pinned down to all the normal obligations of society. Pooja wants to spread her wings and become the nation's biggest singer. However, her dreams encounter a roadblock when her parents decide to get her married. Hence she runs away from home to pursue her dream of becoming a singer. The story unfolds as 'Pooja' meets the 'Lal' family in Mumbai and enters their household in the disguise of a cook. Her attempts to hide her true identity and at the same time live the life of a cook results in complete confusion and comic mayhem ensues in the lives of all the family members.
imdb.title: Lo Ho Gayi Pooja Iss Ghar Ki
akas: Lo Ho Gayi Pooja Iss Ghar Ki (India)
plot: A family that laughs together stays together. Keeping this simple thought in mind, this show is a comedy series that binds a family with the simple thread of humor.

The story revolves around Pooja, a young girl from a small town who has big dreams and doesn't want to be pinned down to all the normal obligations of society. Pooja wants to spread her wings and become the nation's biggest singer. However, her dreams encounter a roadblock when her parents decide to get her married. Hence she runs away from home to pursue her dream of becoming a singer. The story unfolds as 'Pooja' meets the 'Lal' family in Mumbai and enters their household in the disguise of a cook. Her attempts to hide her true identity and at the same time live the life of a cook results in complete confusion and comic mayhem ensues in the lives of all the family members.
